gov.usgs.locator

Class Stepper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.locator.Stepper

  • public class Stepper
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage the R-estimator logic needed to refine the hypocenter.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stepper(Event event, AllBrnVol allBrn, PhaseID phaseID, AuxLocRef auxLoc)
      Keep track of data needed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocStatus makeStep(int stage, int iter)
      Make a step from the current hypocenter to the optimal R-estimator dispersion minimum based on linearized residual estimates.
      protected void setEnviron()
      Set the location environment by determining if the location is in a craton or tectonic area and setting the Bayesian depth.

    • Method Detail

      • setInitDir

        public LocStatus setInitDir(double otherWeight,
                            double stickyWeight,
                            boolean reID,
                            boolean reWeight)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the tectonic flag and Bayesian depth parameters. Then calculate the median residual (origin time correction), R-estimator dispersion, and R-estimator direction of steepest descents. This initial version also sets the reference dispersion value in the hypocenter.
        Parameters:
        otherWeight - Weight for phases that don't match the current phase identification or the current phase group (higher weights make changing to an "other" phase easier)
        stickyWeight - Weight for an exact match (higher weights make changing the current identification harder.
        reID - If true, do the full phase re-identification, if false try not to change identifications
        reWeight - If true, update the residual weights
        Returns:
        LocStatus value
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - On an illegal source depth

      • makeStep

        public LocStatus makeStep(int stage,
                          int iter)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Make a step from the current hypocenter to the optimal R-estimator dispersion minimum based on linearized residual estimates.
        Parameters:
        stage - Iteration stage
        iter - Iteration within the stage
        Returns:
        LocStatus value
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the linearized step length bisection algorithm fails

      • setEnviron

        protected void setEnviron()
        Set the location environment by determining if the location is in a craton or tectonic area and setting the Bayesian depth.
